text: Common Lilac (Syringa vulgaris) is a species of plant in the family Oleaceae. It is native to the Balkan Peninsula in southeastern Europe where it grows on rocky hills.Rushforth, K. (1999). Trees of Britain and Europe. Collins .Med- Checklist: Syringa vulgarisFlora Europaea: Syringa vulgaris It has been introduced to North America. ==References== ==Other websites== *Syringa vulgaris at USDA PLANTS Database Category:Oleaceae hi:नीलक
title: Syringa vulgaris
